title: Possible release date of 5.4?
body: I've been hearing rumours around Tafe that it'll be coming out next week; Others tell me it'll be another 1 Month wait. Has there been any more information regarding a possible release date for it?

replies.body: Essentially a much cheaper version of University.
5.4? 5.3 is coming out tomorrow, meaning that 5.4 will be out in 3-4 weeks given current release cycles.
